src.sql:
SELECT app.*, CAST(app.Amount AS numeric(10,2)) AS ConvertedAmount, apl.FirstName, apl.LastName
FROM app.Application AS app
INNER JOIN app.Applicant AS apl ON apl.Id = app.Applicant
WHERE app.Id = '[tknparams:Id]'
src.columns:
Applicant
Amount
Length
ApplicationName
Status
FileApplication
CreatedDate
InstallmentRate
ConvertedAmount
FirstName
LastName
